content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service?
Uh, hi. Yes, I think I need some help with the, uh, the sink. It’s leaking pretty badly.
I'm sorry to hear about your leaking sink. Can I please have your name to get started?
Thank you, Frank. Could you please provide your address so we can check that you're in our service area and get someone out to help with your sink?
Uh, sure, it's 42 Maple Grove. I think. It's, um, just off of Main Street, next to the big red mailbox.
Thanks for your address, Frank. I'm just checking to see if you're within our service area.
reason: Couldn't determine if the address is within the service area.

content: Hi Frank, this is Angela with XYZ Home Services. Thank you for your patience. To confirm, is your full address 42 Maple Grove Lane, or is it a different street? If you could provide the city or zipcode, I can make sure we have your correct location for the plumbing visit.
Oh, sorry, it's 42 Maple Grove Lane, in Pineville. Zip code is 27109. I get confused sometimes.
Thank you, Frank! That helps a lot. You're definitely within our service area. What time today would be ideal for you to have someone come out to look at your sink?
Uh, as soon as possible. It’s, uh, dripping a lot. This afternoon if you can.
Absolutely, Frank. We have a plumber available between 3:30 and 5:00 PM today. Would that window work for you?
Yes, please, that would be great.

You're all set, Frank! Our plumber will arrive between 3:30 and 5:00 PM today at 42 Maple Grove Lane, Pineville. If you have any other issues or need to make changes, just reply here. Thank you for choosing XYZ!
